title: Davidoff Cool Water Eau de Toilette
description: A força das águas profundas e a masculinidade pura estão incorporadas nesta fragrância icônica. O perfume se desdobra com notas aromáticas de menta e lavanda, mescladas com a sensualidade do âmbar.

title: Gabrielle Essence Eau De Parfum
description: A floral, solar and voluptuous interpretation composed by Olivier Polge, Perfumer-Creator for the House of CHANEL.

title: Acqua di Gio Profumo
description: A sophisticated and intense fragrance that embodies the essence of the Mediterranean. With notes of bergamot, incense, and patchouli, it offers a unique and lasting scent.

title: Versace Eros Eau de Parfum
description: Inspired by Greek mythology, this fragrance is a tribute to passionate love and desire. With vibrant notes of mint, green apple, and tonka bean, it exudes confidence and strength.

title: Tom Ford Noir Extreme
description: A bold and luxurious scent that captures the essence of sophistication. With notes of cardamom, nutmeg, and amber, it delivers an unforgettable fragrance experience.
